column4: Rocky Mountain Chocolate Factory, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells confectionery products. The company offers premium chocolate candies and other confectionery products, such as clusters, caramels, creams, toffees, mints, truffles, gourmet caramel apples, ice cream, coffee, and other sundries. It also franchises and licenses retail stores that offers chocolate and other confectionary products. Rocky Mountain Chocolate Factory, Inc. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Durango, Colorado.
